key.name: active
key.description: Whether this plugin would be activated by ukui-settings-daemon or not

key.name: priority
key.summary: Priority to use for this plugin
key.description: Priority to use for this plugin in ukui-settings-daemon startup queue

key.name: overrides
key.summary: A dictionary of XSETTINGS to override
key.description: This dictionary maps XSETTINGS names to overrides values. The values must be either strings, signed int32s or (in the case of colors), 4-tuples of uint16 (red, green, blue, alpha; 65535 is fully opaque).

key.name: scaling-factor
key.description: This controls the GTK scale factor that maps from window coordinates to the actual device pixels. On traditional systems this is 1, but on very high density displays (e.g. HiDPI, Retina) this can be a higher value (often 2). Set to 0 to auto-detect.
